notes: This herb comes from ashes at the bottom of a stove where Rx. Lithospermi/Arnebiae #{ZiCao} Zi Cao has been burned.
One source indicates that it is old clay from the clay bed inside a stove that has burned dry grass or wood for a long time.
On source say that this herb has astringent properties.
For swollen sores, it is mixed with garlic into a paste and applied to the area.
For moxa blisters, boil and pour the liquid over it.
It can be used alone for general bleeding.
It can be used alone for nausea and vomiting during pregnancy.
